response.original_title: Desarrollo de Videojuegos en Cali, ¿Una Misión Imposible?
response.overview: Animated documentary that reveals the challenges and triumphs of six video game developers in the city of Cali. Through their experiences, topics such as lack of budget, financing difficulties and barriers to publishing are explored. A fictional character, Camilo, connects these stories, symbolizing young people who dream of entering the industry.
response.title: Desarrollo de Videojuegos en Cali, ¿Una Misión Imposible?
